fallback_split.description: a split for all denoms that are not covered in the regular `splits` list

splits.description: maps denom to its split configuration

Decimal.description:
A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0

The greatest possible value that can be represented is 340282366920938463463.374607431768211455 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)

receivers.description: map receiver address to its share of the split
